basic.description: The major aim of this seminar will be to explore, at an advanced level, some of the most crucial legal issues facing the criminal justice system, whether these be matters of the Charter, substantive criminal law, procedure or evidence. Another important aim is to enhance communicative skills in research, writing and trial advocacy. Not offered 2010-2011. (To be offered jointly with LAW-411.)
basic.subject: LAW
basic.title: Advanced Criminal Law
